HeroSection.description: Here, at Internxt, we believe that what humanity can achieve is extraordinary and that our products should enable society to achieve excellence. Our cloud services should not only empower people but must also respect the basic human individual rights. We are working to build a better, safer internet with respect for you, the user, at its core.

subtitle.line1: Today the Internet is controlled by technology giants that offer services and products that
subtitle.line2: are a means to an end. Services that have become essential in our lives and are used to collect
subtitle.line3: data from users to better profile them, as they live off advertising. Privacy should not have
subtitle.line4: such a high cost. We believe in a more ethical internet, where user privacy is at its core.

subtitle.line1: We take privacy and security very seriously, that's why we have a stack of technologies
subtitle.line2: and protocols to always ensure that your data remains safe and private.

square1.title: Military-grade encryption.
square1.description: All the data you store in your Internxt account is encrypted with AES-256. This means that the most powerful processor in the world would need twice the age of the universe to decrypt a small file.

square2.title: Zero-knowledge technology.
square2.description: We ensure that there is no point in time where files, photos, passwords, or any kind of unencrypted data is visible to unauthorized users or servers.

square3.title: GDPR-compliant synchronization.
square3.description: Our commitment is to conform with all GDPR provisions such as privacy by design, the right to information, and the right to be forgotten among many others, and meet future provisions.

square4.title: End-to-end encryption.
square4.description: Everything you store or transfer is encrypted before leaving your device, making it impossible to decrypt without the user's permission, even we can’t access your files, photos or passwords.

InxtAppsSection.subtitle: Free products from Big Tech companies aren't really free, you pay in personal data. Our products will never flip your information or sell your data. When we say free, we mean it.

square1.title: Drive lets you choose what to store and share
square1.description: Drive doesn’t access your personal data or files, instead it was designed from the ground up to give you back control over your files and protect you from data collectors and ad companies. Safeguard your storage.
square1.cta: Take back control over your files

square2.title: With Photos, privacy is always on focus
square2.description: Photos was developed to help you keep a synced gallery of your most perfect moments without fearing for your privacy and worrying about sudden data loss. Memories backed up, safe and sound.

faq.question: Is Internxt’s cloud storage secure?
answer: Internxt Drive is a zero-knowledge file storage service that's built for absolute privacy and strict security. Our service doesn't access your personal data or files for ad purposes, instead is designed to give you back control over your files and protect you from data collection and advertising companies.

faq.question: What is the most private cloud storage?
answer: Many cloud providers say their service is private, but Internxt goes a step above and beyond. Internxt is a zero-knowledge file storage service that’s built for absolute privacy and strict security. Internxt cannot access your data stored in the cloud storage.

faq.question: Is Internxt private?
answer: Unlike some of our competitors, we don't operate based on advertising or data collection. Your data is exclusively yours. We prioritize your security, privacy, and the security of your file and photos. Using Internxt, you can be sure you're secure.
